Meta.title: Full Power Rapid Arrow
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod提供了一个BepInEX配置文件 sosarciel.fullpowerrapidarow.cfg 允许你设置: 速射附魔无衰减 连续射击天赋无衰减
注意, 所有选项默认都不启用 你需要手动在游戏安装目录的BepInEX配置(如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.fullpowerrapidarow.cfg") 内更改配置使其生效
This mod provides a BepInEX configuration file sosarciel.fullpowerrapidarow.cfg that allows you to set the following options: No falloff for Rapid Fire enchantment No falloff for Rapid Arrow feat
Note: All options are disabled by default. You need to manually enable them by editing the configuration file in the game installation directory (e.g., SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.fullpowerrapidarow.cfg)
